metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44506 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in FIS GT.M through V7.0-000 (related to the YottaDB code base). A lack of input validation in calls to do_verify in sr_unix/do_verify.c allows attackers to attempt to jump to a NULL pointer by corrupting a function pointer.

criterions.comment: fis-gtm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
